field.name: summary
field.value: Merge all shared Libraries to root/SharedLibs

field.name: description
field.value:
Currently, common libaries are stored in mutiple locations. It may be nice having them live in the central root/SharedLibs folder to facilitate reuse and simplify library upgrades.
Here's a list of external library depedencies thoughout the project.
ActiveRecord/lib/
- HashCodeProvider - Iesi.Collections - log4net - NHibernate (1.0) - Nullables.NHibernate - Nullables
Facilities/AspectSharp/lib
- antlr.runtime (2.7.3.3)
Facilities/NHibernate/lib
- HashCodeProvider - Iesi.Collections - log4net - NHibernate (older version - safe to merge)
Services/Logging/lib
- log4net - nlog.dotnet
Monorail/lib
- NVelocity - Boo* - anrControls.Markdown.NET
